title: PROJECT: borders
body:
Can i have or buy border for project skin ashe? {{champion:22}} 

Thanks  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Project borders were only available to redeem during the event.  It's not possible to obtain it now, but who knows what the future holds.  Keep your eyes on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page in case something does come up!  Sorry friend!
thank you :) i really want it :P
